case.state: Y-Your... thing! It's just out, ~name~!
Public decency! C-Cover it up, ~name~!
Do you not have a shirt to cover up with, ~name~!?
Please don't make me play this with one of my professors!
I don't think I want to play while Shamir can watch me...
Are you here to celebrate my birthday with me? How sweet!
You remembered my birthday ~player~...?
lets fuckin gooooo
I know you aren't really Claude, but I still feel a bit odd with you staring at me.
Nice to meet you, I'm Ignatz. W-What was that...? You forgot my name already?
It's very nice to meet you all, my name is Ignatz.
It's very nice to meet you, ~player~. My name is Ignatz.
Is this an activity sponsored by the Monastery?
As long as everyone is comfortable playing, I suppose it's okay.
The Monastery is a special type of school. Mercedes is 23, after all.
Do I look that young? I'm 18.
Huh? Are people watching this?
Cut the cameras! I never agreed to that!

condition.saying: Dorothea told me about this "social interaction practice" seminar that they were hosting. She said there'd be 4 other people at most, so I decided I might as well take it...

case.state: Erm, Bernadetta...? I don't think this is what Dorothea told you it would be...
Are you going all in Leonie? I'll do my best to keep up with you then!
Oh wow! What a holy being!
Navi, your form is simply breathtaking! May I paint you?
Navi, you have such an interesting form!
A true goddess!?
I don't deserve to be in your presence, dear goddess. Bless you.
Oh! Hello Leonie!
You're an artist, Yusuke? It's a pleasure to meet you!
A professional artist?
Oh! Hello Hilda!
Hilda?
A... butterfly?
Co-ed showers...?
What are you trying to do exactly, ~player~...?
You're very odd, ~player~. Especially placing us in this classroom together.
Oh, I do love the library!
I spend a lot of my free time in the library. At least this environment is familiar.
Are you sure it's okay to play here? This is a place for research and reading, after all.
I hope everyone is enjoying this free day!
Sundays are the only days I truly have off, at least if I'm not on a mission.
Sunday is my favorite day. I usually spend it in the cathedral.
This reminds me of the monastery's sauna. I don't really go there often though...
I haven't been to a bathhouse before!
But there's people here!
I can't do this in public, please have a heart!
T-There's so many people... staring... at me...
I don't feel very safe here...
Um, are you sure this is a good idea ~player~?
An odd choice...
A classroom!?
This isn't okay- a classroom is for learning!
I don't get to travel much, but the sun feels wonderful.
I'm not used to going anywhere beyond forests- this is truly breathtaking.
The steam is so relaxing, I can feel my stresses melting away...
Why not just indulge in these springs? This game seems rather vulgar anyways.
A... bedroom?
Just what are you planning to do with everyone in here...?
Oh my- It's so late... I really need to return to my room after this.
I don't remember it being so dark before. Is it night now?
Was today a girls day at the monastery? I'm so sorry for intruding!
~fe~... that name is familiar... hm.
I apologize for staring at you, ~fe~. I just swear I've seen you somewhere before...
Oh! It seems we all have glasses, how funny!
I suppose we all have vision problems.
Um, ~gun~, what is that you're carrying? I've never seen anything like it.
What strange machinery, what is that exactly ~gun~?
Was I supposed to bring my bow to this?
It seems everyone else brought their weapons... I'm sorry, I didn't realize we were training.
We were supposed to bring our weapons? But I forgot my bow!
It's rather comforting to see some people I know here!
Let's all have fun together!
Fear the deer!
Why did you place me here?
I feel like this is a jab at my masculinity...
I'm sorry, it feels as if I intruded on a girls get together...
Isn't this game played with more people? Maybe I just learned this wrong.
Just us and ~player~?
It's nice to meet all of you.
Let's all have a good time together.
Is this normally played with strangers...?
May we form new friendships!
I guess it is important to get out of my comfort zone every once in a while...
Can't we pause for a second? I doubt I'd be able to read my cards.
Where did they go?
I can barely see my hands in front of me!
You all can continue without me, I need to find my glasses.
P-Pinkie... you're really scaring me!
Komi-san, there's no need to take your jacket off too!
Huh? Why are you removing your jacket Komi-san? You didn't lose again.
Oh thank the goddess, I thought people were seeing this...
So were you really broadcasting this!?
Fear the Deer!
I'm happy with these... no need to give me new ones, dealer.
Thank you, but I won't need any new cards this time.
I don't think I need any new cards this round.
Just one new card, thank you.
One new card, please.
Just one new card, if that's alright.
Can I have ~cards~ cards please? Thank you.
~cards~ please!
Can I have ~cards~ new cards?
~cards~ cards please.
Um... ~cards~ please.
I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.
Should I exchange these all? Erm, I'll take ~cards~ cards please...
~cards~ new cards please!
Dealer, I'll take ~cards~ cards!
I can still do this... Um, ~cards~ cards please...
~cards~ cards...
Um... ~cards~ new cards.
~cards~ new cards, dealer!
Is it a good idea to give me ~cards~ new cards? I'll let fate decide...
~cards~ cards... p-please...
I'm counting on you dealer... Can I have ~cards~ cards?
I'm really counting on the ~cards~ new cards I get!
H-Hey! Here's to ~cards~ new, good cards!
Oh please be ~cards~ better cards...
I think I'm going to beat Leonie at something for the first time!
That was a good decision it seems.
My professor always says I have great luck!
I've been struck by inspiration!
Oh yes!
I think I've got this one!
Oh, thank you, dealer!
I can sing for the heavens! M-Maybe later though... when I'm not surrounded by people...
Yes!
Thank you very much.
Oh thank the goddess...
Oh thank you!
I'm glad I made that choice!
Thank you!
Still in it.
I'll do my best.
I hope this ends up okay.
As long as everyone's okay...
I ask for blessings in the next round!
I thought I was better with strategy...
Could be worse!
Doing okay!
This feels risky...
I can still win this!
Well... I d-did my best...
I'm sure there's something good here...
What would the professor do?
I well understand chance, so I suppose this was a likely outcome...
I can't afford this right now...
C-Could be worse...!
Oh please work...
Well... maybe if I do this...
Luck don't fail me now!
I'm nervous...
Go easy on me Jotaro!
You're crushing me!
That was an awful decision!
Did I do something for such awful karma?
At least everyone else will stay dressed...
I don't think the dealer likes me...
Ugh, missed chance...
I'll need to note to not make that mistake again.
I guess you guys won't have to undress...!
Well, I messed up.
I truly am an idiot.
Why did I do that!?
Please don't pick on me like this.
Did Lysithea set you up for this!?
How much longer until this is over?
Giving that card away was a mistake...
Prepare for disgust.
I need a second... sorry...
Have mercy!
Oh please- Hm?
Is it over here...?
(Please be intact... I can't afford another pair!)
I'm sorry dealer, but, what do these say?
I can't play right now, I need to find my glasses before they're broken!
Oh my Arash- a-all of them?
I h-haven't even... wow, you'd do that with all of them?
The professor gave me the most beautiful flowers this year! I'm so happy!
You remembered my birthday? I'm so touched!
You're right, Panty, this is a paradise! I can't wait to paint the sunset!
Nature is truly so beautiful. The nightlife isn't important, what matters is the beauty the Goddess put on this earth.
The bible!
Do you need help? I'm a master at tying cravats, my hands are dexterous.
I can retie your cravat for you Hilda! I have dexterous hands.
Komi-san, why are you removing your jacket?
There's no need to take your jacket off Komi-san, please, take your time.
Wow Komi-san! You seem so determined!
The goddess smiles upon the angel!
Painting angels has become rather natural to me, yet it's so different seeing one in person!
Pit, would you have any interest in modeling for me? I'd love to do a portrait of you.
Your nude form would translate to a beautiful statue! Pit, pose for me will you?
Stand still Pit! I'm going to find a way to sculpt you!
(It's nice to see her smile...)

condition.saying: Just to make things clear; I'm not lonely when I'm sitting in my room all day! I'm just, um, very isolated! ...On purpose!

case.state: Oh Bernadetta...
While I wish I could isolate sometimes, my duties as a knight are more important.
Is this you asking for someone to stay with you?
I only really sing in the monastery's church, I don't think I'm very good though.
I've only really sung at church, I'm not very good at it, but that doesn't matter much.
Any day dedicated to the Goddess is a day worth celebration.
What kind of advantage did you expect? Didn't you just lose more clothes in the end?
I'm not sure I follow your logic here, Hilda. You seem to have lost for no real reason.
I'm not sure what you're plotting, but it's certainly scaring me...
(Such a terrifying gaze!)
Something about seeing Jotaro so unsure is really uncomfortable!
A-Are you okay? Where did your earlier attitude go...?
I'm from the Leicester Alliance of Fodlan. It's not very interesting there, though.

condition.saying: Alright, I've been thinking, and I've settled on my mercenary title. Ready? ... The Blade Breaker II. What do you all think?

case.state: Blade Breaker II, hm? That's a fitting title for you, Leonie.
Maybe, o-only if you want of course, I can paint a portrait of the great Blade Breaker II?
I have some... problems with my family. I value them, but I won't deny the issues we have...
Family is important. I respect my father, but I don't think he respects me.
I value my family, but my brother and I have never truly gotten along. We're very different.
Family is important, but my own are rather...
No worries Komi-san! Please, don't strain yourself.
No need to apologize Komi-san, I understand how hard it is to speak to others.

condition.saying: I want to be a top-tier mercenary, like Captain Jeralt the Blade Breaker. For my title, Caspar suggested... The Raging Bear. Well?

case.state: The Raging Bear? I thought your favorite food was bear meat! Are you naming yourself after your favorite food?
How about something more refined? That title brings to mind something like a rabid animal.

condition.saying: If I want to be as good as the Blade Breaker, I need my own tough-sounding title. I was thinking... The Executioner. Well?

case.state: The Executioner... It'll certainly strike fear into your enemies.
What kind of portrait would follow that of The Executioner? It sounds so threatening!
I'm sorry to hear that, Mia. My father had me leave for the Monastery when I was seventeen, but beyond that, I stayed at home.
Yes... Goddess bless them all, even if they were thieves.
I'm ashamed to say I have. Even if they were bandits, I can't help but feel guilty.
I'm so forgettable, there's no way anyone would like me nearly that much.
There's no need to insult my artwork, even if I'm not very good. But I'm training to become a real knight, you know.
You're a goddess? Please excuse my idiocy!
A real life goddess? I must be dreaming! It's an honor to be in your presence, dearest Neptune!
And what does that entail...?
Kazuma, you remind me of something truly unholy.
Last I was aware, you don't judge what I buy!
You said our purchases were confidential!
You sound like my friend Raphael... he's always eating!
You're reminding me of my friend Raphael, he loves nothing more than eating.
I'm not sure what that is, do corrupted beasts count?
Well I've aided in taking down a rather disgusting sand beast...
Not to be gross, but isn't the "backdoor" the only option for me?
Well, I don't know where else it could go...
Over time I've learned to accept the past for what it is. There's no reason to allow the future to be ruined by it.
Raphael has taught me that the past is the past... it's important to look forwards.
To be quite honest, I've never even been in a relationship.
I've... I've never slept with anyone yet.
I've never slept with someone, nor have I been in a relationship yet...
I particularly did not enjoy that.
Performance? You must really enjoy this game...
Um... Miss Fina... I'd love to learn more about your world some time. Maybe, um, over some tea?
Teach me your secrets to winning ~leader~!
There has to be some trick to doing as good as ~leader~...
Is it really just me and ~player~ now?
I hope I can beat you, ~player~...
I'm not giving up! Prepare for a fight, ~player~!
Everyone else is doing so well, is there something I'm not understanding?
I'm sorry, I don't think I understand this game...
It's red versus blue now!
Let's hope I get a critical...
No hard feelings, okay ~opponent~?-But I really don't want to lose.
Some people look smart if they're wearing glasses. Not me though.
Are you alright ~gloom~? You remind me of a classmate at the monastery. If you need anything, please let me know.
Thank you all so much for your patience. If anyone wants, I'll gladly paint them.
Everyone, thank you for your kindness. I'd love to show my thanks in the form of a painting.
I'm sorry to ask but, um... Does anyone have any studying advice? My assassin certifications are tomorrow.
Huh? B-But, I couldn't even see my cards! I thought we paused?
I couldn't see my cards! Please be fair to me here!
It's a slump, it's not an excuse!
It's a slump, please overlook it!
I've been Miku-Miku'd! (For reals).
I "should draw her giving birth"? W-What about my hair says I'd ever draw something like that!?
I know I'm short, but there's no need to make fun of me.
You're a very, um, threatening woman, Revy. I'm just here for fun, so let's all r-relax.
Why are you so interested in the size of my, um, g-genitals!?
Thank you, Leonie. I promise it'll be just this once...
It's a lot less scary when someone is being so kind to me.
Komi-san, your kind words mean a lot to me. Thank you very much.
A courtier? You flatter me! I don't think I can dream of ever being close to someone of such high status.
It's Ignatz, Saki! Are you doing that on purpose because I'm so "nerdy"?
It's Ignatz, Saki! Saying "no offense" before something so mean doesn't make it any less hurtful!
Nude models aren't the only type of model!
Are artists known for seeing lots of naked people? Because I certainly don't...
Is it that easy to tell I'm not fit for fighting? Well, truth be told, I only joined by my father's command.
Goodness, is height that important to some people? I wish I was taller, but I was just made this way.
I never considered height to be very telling of personality, everyone is different.
Art is... more of a hobby for me, I guess. But if you need anything, I'm happy to have you as a patron.
Leonie, please look away!
I'm afraid I lack the guts you have, Leonie, so maybe you should look away.
I don't think I can take my underwear off in the presence of a goddess!
Can I not have one minute to relax!?
No way I'm losing my pants right after my shirt!
It's obvious you just want me to strip for you!
~player~, you're acting like Sylvain would!
W-What? Is this a scheme by Claude?
There's no way!
This has to be a setup! You just wanted me naked, didn't you!?
I lost that round? That's surprising.
Huh? I lost? But I was so confident in those cards!
A bad start leads to a bad game...
I don't feel very good about this game...
I just need to stay optimistic.
I don't like the look ~slutty~ is giving me.
I'm not interested, ~slutty~! P-Perversion must be stopped!
B-But, you all are women! You don't want to see this, right?
You want me to undress? B-But... a girl has never seen me like this before!
Are you sure you want me to take these off...?
The expectant gaze of women... I'm terrified!
Deep breaths... deep breaths, Ignatz!
I suppose this isn't too different from changing in a locker room.
The men at my school have to share a restroom, so this isn't too different.
I had run into my classmate in a towel once, it was embarrassing, but at least we were both men.
Getting a little too close for comfort here...
I'm very grateful to be in the lead at the very least.
(Just a shirt... nothing to make a big deal over...)
I suppose it's only fair...
I can't tell if losing more clothes will make me more comfortable around half naked people, or less comfortable...
As long as I can keep my shorts on!
I hope this is how far I go in removing my clothes!
This shouldn't be too bad.
It's important I move out of my comfort zone every so often.
I guess so!
It isn't a huge deal I suppose.
It's only fair...
Would it make everyone feel a little less awkward?
Well, I can't win them all!
Still in first, deep breaths!
I suppose it c-could be worse...?
I need a moment, I'm sorry...
I'm winning, but feel like the biggest loser...
Ah, it's okay, it's only my shoes.
It's too early to be confident in winning...
I hope the floor isn't too cold, these socks are rather thin.
Just my ~clothing~, could be worse.
Being in the middle is oddly painful...
I'm okay!
I can still win this!
I won't lose another match after this...!
Should have seen that coming...
Well, I did my best. Isn't that what matters most?
It seems my best wasn't enough...
Uuu.... I suppose...
I'm sorry, please give me a second to collect myself.
Well, I suppose rules are rules... Deep breaths!
Can I at least take these off behind a tree?
This truly cannot get any worse...
Hm? Ah, yes.
Did I forget a rule or something?
And I thought I wasn't an idiot...
My best just isn't enough...
If I must.
It's still the beginning, I can flip this around!
I won't let this upset me!
I'll still win this!
Getting a bit nervous now!
What am I doing wrong?
Is this some elaborate prank?
Last place... and such little clothing left...
Can I still win this?
I just don't want to be seen naked.
The first to take these off...?
Don't make me the first one to remove that!
I really messed this game up.
G-Goodness, my heart is about to leap out of my chest!
I'm so pathetic. I'm sorry you have to be here with me.
There truly is nothing I can do right...
There's no use in me whining over it, so I'll just comply.
Oh, it doesn't matter... It's not like I can see everyone's disgusted reactions.
Later on I can tie both of our cravats. If you want, I mean...
I'm made fun of enough by my one classmate, so I'd appreciate that.
My shoes are the easy choice, so I'll go with them
I'm sorry, please be patient with me.
These shoes belong to the monastery, so I'll be sure I don't lose them.
I suppose rules are rules.
It's just socks.
I'm sorry. I've never been one to be flashy.
I suppose I'll live without my vest.
Will I knock my glasses off pulling this up...? Uu! A-Almost did!
This is the logical choice after my socks...
I apologize if this disappoints you.
Some students seem to struggle with the cravat, but I've gotten rather good at tying it.
This is the next choice.
Such small buttons!
I'm making this a bigger deal than it is...
Promise not to mock me?
I should have done better...
I hope the ground doesn't dirty these...
Why is the floor sticky...?
Don't you dare peek at me!
Not a word about this!
(I feel like I'll be sick...)
Y-You asked for this!
I can see you peeking at me ~other~...
I-It doesn't matter, I just need to find these.
Please be over soon...
Um, you all can continue! Just don't mind me!
The question is, who is going to laugh at my nude form first?
The next lecture we have is going to be unbearably awkward.
Please don't tell anyone, okay Leonie? Hilda?
Well, when you put it like that... I suppose you're right.
Can I trust you not to tell the others about this? You already said a secret of Seteth's....
Y-Yes, you're right... This is nothing compared to those beasts.
Yes... I can do this... Just deep breaths...
Hilda, you won't tell anybody about my um... size, right?
Glad to have helped you learn that, Leonie.
It was a bit stuffy in here, I may have been nervous, but I think I feel better now...
The steam was making me kind of sweaty, it feels much better to have my shirt off.
Oh why!?
Must I? I'm sorry I'm so bad at this game...
I never should have agreed to this! Now I'm the first to show something so vulgar!?
I've heard that girls talk about boy's bodies to each other... I can't help but be nervous.
Could be much worse!
It isn't a big deal.
I-I'm still in it!
Doing okay!
I won't let this hold me back!
A minor setback.
My socks are rather thin, but removing the garters is often relieving.
See? I can get over my nerves!
The comments aren't necessary!
I'm aware of how small it is, thank you all.
Can we move on now?
Let's just continue the game, please.
I don't think ever worn my shirt without the vest!
I will give this everything I've got!
Perhaps my new strategy will be more effective!
I refuse to back down!
Just my shorts left...
This feels humiliating!
Have I always looked so skinny?
I know I don't look like it, but I do train very often.
I do know a student leaner than me, his name is Lorenz.
So it's reached this point...
I can't believe I only have my underwear left!
I've had nightmares like this.
This will be an interesting story to tell my friends.
That wasn't too- Wait! My glasses!
I suppose it doesn't- Huh? W-Why is everything so blurry?
It isn't a big- Huh? My glasses!
I'll certainly feel like less of a pervert...
Oh to still have clothing left on...
The game continues on.
You certainly beat me, ~name~...
Better luck next time!
Perhaps you shouldn't have given that card away...
It's you or me... I'm sorry...
In the end, it all comes down to chance.
Please don't be angry with me!
Luck must've decided against you tonight...
(Is this against my religion? I've painted nude angels before...)
(Is this against my religion? I've painted nude angels before, but this context...)
I still can't get over being here with a living angel!
(So my painting depictions were close... albeit with more colorful and elegant hair...)
Excuse me, Colress... but are you a crest researcher?
Excuse my staring...
I suppose there are some benefits to this game.
I'm starting to understand the appeal of a game such as this!

condition.saying: I admit, I've often looked when the guys strip...

case.state: You've watched me undress before!?
B-Bernadetta! Don't tell me you've seen me undress!
That's exactly why I avoid going to the sauna!

condition.saying: ~Name~... is surprisingly cute! He's like a little boy!

case.state: That's a very strange thing to say!
I'm so lucky to have won that!
~name~ lost? I didn't lose!?
( Safe for another round...)
It's okay! No need to be nervous! I'm very calm!
I'm sorry ~name~.
(I'm happy it wasn't me...)
I wish you luck in the next round.
It isn't me! I'm so happy!
I promise not to look.
(I feel like such a creep...)
And people find this fun?
Next round is sure to be in your favor, ~name~.
I-I'm sorry ~name~!
Extra support from ~name~ isn't a horrible thing I suppose...
I hope it's something major...
I hope you don't reach this point ~name~...
Y-You can still win it!
I'll root for you ~name~!
Um...
G-Good luck next round, ~name~...
That part of the game is long gone for me.
I think I'd perform better with a guy losing clothes.
Good luck next round!
I see some flaws in your strategy...
A simple mistake, really...
Did you not fully think it through ~name~?
I'm sure next round will go in your favor!
A pair of twos is always better than a lone ace.
I know it doesn't mean much, but I-I believe in you!
This is so awkward...
You can win! Don't worry!
U-Um...
There's no need to be so humble, Leonie. You're a strong woman who would make anybody happy as a partner.
N-No need to be so upset, Wikipe-tan! This is just for fun, right?
Wikipe-tan, please calm down! This is just a fun game between friends, right?
That's the spirit Chiaki! Never give up a battle!
Y-Yeah! You can do it!
That's the spirit Chiaki! Never give up a battle!
I believe in you!
Should I alert Marianne that you require healing?
I left all my vulneraries back home...

condition.saying: I'm... uh, feeling very very ill! *cough* I need to go back to the dorms! ...No one's buying it, are they...?

case.state: Now you're sounding like Hilda!
You can do it Bernadetta! Just pretend we aren't here!
I-I believe in you Bernadetta!
Critical hit to Chiaki!
Your luck stat must've run out Chiaki...
Seems you're running out of HP...
H-Hang on! We just need a healer, don't worry!
Where's a tactician when you need one?
Jessie, your confidence is truly admirable.
This situation terrifies me... yet you're so calm! How do you do it Jessie?
I won't look Leonie, please just ignore me.
Class will certainly be awkward, please do not tell Claude about what happens here.
Hilda... are you slacking off again?
Are you taking this game seriously, Hilda? Or are you treating it like your cleaning?
I'm happy to clean for you, but I don't think I can win this for you, Hilda.

condition.saying: I just read… normal books. Totally not some of the more… romantic books from Abyss… (D-did I just say that out loud!?)

case.state: Are you the one Seteth keeps taking inappropriate books from?
I'm sorry, ~name~! I'm so sorry!
W-What did I do to make ~name~ hate me already?
It's like Lysithea all over again...
I'm sorry to say that I've never been in bed with anyone.
I'm sorry, but I'm a virgin.
That is no way to solve money problems!
Just because I'm a commoner doesn't mean I'm that desperate for money!
Disgusting! Um- sorry, a bit of an intense reaction...
Why would anyone want to purchase my sweat?
Where are you from, Streaming-chan? The people seem terrifying.
It's you or me, I'm sorry. Please don't be mad!
In the end, it all comes down to chance.
Good luck next round!
I see some flaws in your strategy...
You can still win, ~name~!
A simple mistake, really...
I'm sure next round will go in your favor!
It isn't me! I'm so happy!
I p-promise not to look...
Sorry...
It's alright ~name~...!
Just close your eyes and pretend we aren't here, ~name~...
Um...
I don't have much to say about this.
The chances of a direct tie here are incredibly low. How interesting!
For any card game, a tie is so unlikely, so maybe this is a sign of good luck for all of us?

condition.saying: Green hair...? Looks kind of toxic, ~name~. Most organic toxins and corrosives don't really affect me, though...

case.state: Toxic...?
You've waited until now to take that off?
That's fine, let's just move on.
You're very lucky to have extra things to take off!
Standing bare while ~name~ removes his ~clothing~...
I can't blame you.
Smart choice...
It's okay to take your time.
I wish I wore accessories to this...
I'm happy to take this game slow.
(Maybe this won't be as scary as I thought...)
I won't argue with your choices.
I sit here naked and you just remove your ~clothing~...
Are you taunting me?
I feel weird, h-has it always been so hot?
Your strategy is yours, I won't criticize you.
My mood is a bit soured...
It seems rather late into the game to remove something like that.
Those armbands are gorgeous!
I can't get over your dressing, it's wonderful Pit!
Sothis blesses you, Pit.
Are ghosts real? Was Lysithea correct all along?

condition.saying: Short hair may not look as elegant in combat, but it's very simple, huh, ~name~?

We just continue?
I'll pretend t-that isn't happening...
Try and enjoy yourself I suppose...?
The stakes truly are high!
It's odd to say, but it's rather comforting to not be alone doing this.
I'm sorry that you're out of the game...
If you want, we can guess on who will win!
I was nervous in the beginning, but now I'm just tired.
I'm sorry!
If there's anything you need to feel more comfortable, please let me know.

condition.saying: Whaaat! I never expected you to be the type for that, Leonie! That's... actually pretty hot.

case.state: Hilda, you're encouraging that type of thing!?
I knew it was the right decision to avoid that place!
The person awaiting your confession is the Goddess, Leonie.
No need to button-mash Chiaki...
This must be the bonus round.
You really give everything your all, don't you Leonie?
It's strange. I've seen Leonie covered in blood, yet this is scarier to me.
To see such a beautiful girl in front of me doing this, and the fact she's my classmate...
I- I'm looking too much aren't I? Is this the mark of a pervert?
I will follow any order you give, ~name~...
I think I know what type of woman I like!
Really? I didn't expect anyone to say yes! Thank you, Penny!
I'd be happy to play with you again, Penny!
I don't think I need to see this.
It's none of my business what ~name~ is doing! Don't expect a reaction...
I promise I'm not judging!
It's interesting how a tonal shift can completely change a nude piece, is it not?
Uh- I have no idea what to say about ~name~...
I can do anything you ask of me, i-if you want!
Talking is always difficult, but this truly is the hardest situation to commentate.
You're so beautiful, ~name~. But- I'm just so sorry.
I sincerely hope my presence isn't making you uncomfortable!
Y-You're... very pretty.
Painting ideas truly come to me at the strangest of times. Now isn't appropriate to begin sketching flowers!
Beyond my classmates, I don't spend much time with women. Or really with anyone, for that matter...
Bliss is an expression worn beautifully on everyone. Thank the Goddess for such wonderful feelings.
This is confidential, right? I think I'd be stoned to death if it wasn't.
Training so often is really quite stressful, this was a nice change of pace.
So many emotions are flowing through me... It's rather overwhelming.
Seeing the raw side of ~name~ does make me feel as if we've grown a bit closer. Have we?
Uh- Hilda...
For how often you lie, you aren't very good at it.
Oh my-!!!
Game Over!
Well, it seems you enjoyed yourself Leonie...
You're as rough with yourself as you are against thieves!
That boy who encountered a masturbating girl can neither describe what he saw, nor how he felt at that moment at all.
Is it over?
I'll try and forget that...
I'll just continue like that didn't happen...
I don't think I needed a in person reference for how that's done, but it's alright.
Is that what squirting is!?
I'd say I'm sorry you lost, but you seem to have enjoyed yourself.
You look overwhelmed ~name~. Are you alright?
What a wonderful expression of pleasure! I can only hope I feel that good.
Is that what the female orgasm looks like...? My, it's beautiful.
I guess I'll continue to just sit here...
This is almost over.
Eek! Why did it do that!?
Oh dear!
I can't help but wonder if my female classmates do that... I'm such a pervert!
I'd rather I suffer if it will aid my classmates.
Leonie, Hilda, please don't forget my sacrifice.
Are you being serious? In front of someone from my school...?
The first person to lose...
I know what's next, but I don't want to acknowledge it.
Why? Do you want to laugh at me that bad?
I should have counted my cravat separately, shouldn't I?
Is this too far?
Hilda, you won't share this secret, will you?
Um, Leonie. Please don't tell anybody else.
I should issue a formal apology before I start this. Leonie, I'm sorry.
Out of anyone in our class, you're honestly the last person I'd want to do this in front of.
I think I'd rather Lorenz witness this. He isn't a beautiful girl, after all.
Maybe I'll win the next game?
Can you at least stop staring at me!?
What's with that expectant gaze?
I suppose luck wasn't on my side today...
I-I'm just going to... sit on the ground I suppose...
Um, I'll just do this on the ground...
I rarely even do this at home...
Do you want to use me?
I know I'm small, but I can handle it.
Are you looking at me, ~man~? P-Please continue!
I'm going to need extra lessons in faith after this.
I know I'm small, but I can handle it.
Are you looking at me, ~agfem~. P-Please continue!
I'm going to need extra lessons in faith after this.
I think I'm getting it now!
I hide a second sketchbook under my bed... the sketches in it are rather different...
To my own shame, I think I'm understanding the appeal behind this now.
Are you sure this is okay?
It's been a long time since I've done this.
The Goddess deserves all credit for allowing our bodies to feel in such a way.
The Monastery is a holy place, so doing this here makes me feel much less guilty.
I'm very flexible, you know.
I feel as if this will haunt me for the rest of my life...
Please just focus on your cards!
I don't think I can, but I will try and enjoy myself.
I'm the worlds biggest loser.
I'm sorry I'm so filthy, ~agg~. But I really like when you yell at me!
Do you hate me ~agg~?
I-It's the muscles that really get me going...
P-Please ~muscle~, flex... for me?
I see you l-looking at me, ~opponent~... but you don't have to look away!
I think I understand what Claude was talking about now.
Oh my, it's never been so intense for me!
U-Ungh... hah-
I couldn't remember how good this felt... m-maybe I should do it more often?
Is this why people do this so often?
I've been missing out!
Who knew that heaven was so close?
I-I think I'm...
Critical hit!
I can't take it any longer!
R-Raphael!
T-That's done now.
I f-forgot how good that can feel.
That felt heavenly.
Hearing you say that makes me feel a bit silly. I suppose it is natural.
I'd really like to stop sitting in my own... um... seed?
C-Can we maybe hurry? I don't like sitting with this mess on myself...
Sticky...
My hands need to be scrubbed clean after that.
To be honest, I still fear that doing something like that will invoke Her wrath...
You can do it ~playing~!
I'm excited to see who will come out as the winner!
This is kind of uncomfortable...
Can I please wash this off?
I thought some things during that that I wish I could forget...
I really should wash myself, letting it sit is unsanitary.
My heart is beating so fast in my chest, that was exhausting!
I don't understand how some men could do that daily, it's draining.
It's alright to stay sitting, right? My legs are a bit shaky.
It's been over a week since I did anything like that, maybe even longer.
At the Monastey, many students will write eachother love letters. I- um, haven't gotten any though.
I've always been more of an observer than anything else, so playing this was rather strange.
Training and missions do get very stressful. I have to admit I enjoyed this change of pace.
Now I've done it... I went and embarassed myself in front of everyone!
I've always believed that these types of activities were sinful. It hasn't been until recently that I've accepted them.
Leonie, Hilda, are you two alright?
No hard feelings, right Leonie?
I can't believe I found a way to win against the ultimate gamer!
Did you go easy on me because it's my birthday?
This was fun, ~player~. Thank you for celebrating with me!
Oh dear, I'm sorry you lost to me Hilda!
You always win against me when we train, but I suppose I bested you here. Not that I'm very proud of it.
I can't believe I did so well, thank you all for playing this with me.
Really? I won?
Perhaps my professor was right about my luck!
I did it! I r-really did it!
It seems I made the correct decisions!
Oh thank the goddess... I kept my pants on the whole match!
Is everyone okay?
You aren't trying to fool me right?
This was awkward... but I'm so glad I went out of my comfort zone like this!
Too close for comfort...
That was a close one...
I'm so happy! Thank you all for spending this time with me!
I made it through!
I know I've won, but everyone saw me naked... this is still rather humiliating.
I won? R-Really?
Thank you all for being patient with me, this was a little fun after all!
I can't believe I've gotten over my shyness like this! Thank you for befriending me...
Oh, I just got lucky...
Kazuma's luck really is scary!

condition.saying: Erm, thanks everyone. Can I get dressed now?

case.state: Y-Yes, perhaps we all should get dressed...
The world truly is hers.
That's the expected outcome when you go up against the ultimate gamer!
I can't show my face around the monastery anymore- I'm so sorry Leonie!
Hard work and determination really does best all. Congratulations Leonie!
I'm not surprised. See how good you do when you put effort into things?
This went about as well as our training matches.
Did you h-have to use the word "creamed"?
I'm begging you Leonie... please don't tell Raphael anything...
Well, I'll see you at the monastery Bernadetta.
Going from speaking behind a door to playing a game like this, you did great!
Second place? I was so close to avoiding this part!
Congratulations ~name~, you bested me!
I'm okay with getting second, that was surprisingly fun.
I'm a terrible friend... I can't believe I said his name...
With stakes so high, that game was really exciting! Let's... play again sometime?
Congratulations on winning, ~name~!
Please don't think about the things I've said...
Maybe that was a little fun, it's certainly more interesting than chess.
Everyone please watch your step, my glasses are somewhere on the floor!
I'm sorry everyone b-but it seems my glasses fell off. Please watch your step!
They're alright! I'm good to continue now!
Oh thank the goddess, I found them! I'll join again!
I found them, they're okay! I'll start playing again now!
I'm... ashamed to admit that Hilda's words are having an affect on me as well...
A haircut? Is there something wrong with your hair? Well, if you'd like me to wait that's alright.
You're starting to hurt my head here...
I agree completely! I can only hope I can bring your form the justice it deserves, Lux.
You look nothing short of a war hero, Lux. It would be my honor to paint you.
R-Really? I honestly had expected a no... You're so beautiful Fina, it would be an honor.
It doesn't have to be nude! I'm sorry, did I make it sound like it had to be?
Oh goodness, like that? M-Maybe I could, um, if you want...
Oh my... N-No, I intended for it to be fully clothed...
I'm not doing that! How about a normal portrait?
Oh my, thank you for your advice, Miko! I'll be sure to keep that in mind!
A portrait like that... I've never even attempted it! Goodness Fina, I didn't intend for these implications but...
You'd like that, Penny? I'm happy to!
Ah, that's alright, Miku. I apologize if I overstepped.
Ignatz! It's Ignatz, Saki! But um, yes, I'd be happy to paint you and your friends...
Oh my, of course not nude! I didn't sound like I wanted that only, right?
You'd like me to stay? R-Really? If you say so, Penny...
Um, Colress? What is that thing you're holding?
